entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Snow level lowering to 1900 metres overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.
